name: Dasher Dan - Zombie Monkey Island
description:
Escape from Zombie Monkey Island! Only Dasher Dan can fight off Zombie Monkeys and man-eating plants while leaping over Poisonous Spikes. It’s a fun challenge!

Dasher Dan has stolen the ancient monkey statue and is now running for his life. Can he escape in time? Can he shoot all the zombie monkeys? This is a quest for the adventurous. Gather gold coins to earn new characters.

** Challenge Your Friends for Highest Score!
** Great Time-Killer Game!
** Tons of fun!

Download ‘Dasher Dan’ Now!!!
